resources.string: This pendulum animation is made with a rotation pivoted at x = 50%, y = 0%. The physics isn\'t quite right since the motion is linear, but it illustrates a pivoted rotation pretty well.

Riley's Weather Rock
 Touch the rock for more detailed info.
 Set the Location using the map.
 At A Glance:
 Rock is wet - Rain
 Rock is swinging - windy (1 swing/min = 1 mph)
 Rock is white on top - Snow
 Rock is blurry - Fog
 Clouds in sky - Cloudy
The rock is swinging %.2f times per minute\n The rock feels like %.2f \u00B0F
